Title: FRAMEWORK FOR PRINTING AND FULFILMENT SERVICES
Description:
This tender was completed to create a Framework Agreement with multiple lots which will cover various Printing and Fulfilment requirements including printing of letters, intelligent merging and matching of letters, insertion of letters and other printed articles into an envelope, insertion of envelopes into a mailing providers supply chain and printing of magazines and other printed articles. 

This Framework will be available to Gateshead Council, The Gateshead Housing Company and any other Contracting Authority that may wish to use it.

Title: Provision of Electoral Services Stationery, Printing and Registration Services
Description: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham (acting as the Lead Council) on the behalf of any local authority listed in the London Government Directory (http://directory.londoncouncils.gov.uk/) is inviting tenders for the provision of stationery, printing and registration services in respect of elections and the European Referendum over the next 4 years from June 2016.It is envisaged that the Council will set up a Framework Agreement, with up to 3 Framework Contractors consisting of the following 3 Lot(s):Lot 1 Elections Stationery and Printing Services;Lot 2 Individual Electoral Registration Stationery and Printing Services;Lot 3 Telephone and Internet Electoral Registration Services.Suppliers may apply for 1 or more Lots.The Lead Council and Participating Bodies require a rapid and cost effective provision of services to meet strict deadlines and accord with legislation for the production of the annual Register of Electors and ongoing IER.
